channel.title: How to edit the vote system Matrix?
channel.description: i tried spawning torva and it said I needed to vote, could some 1 tell me how I can edit that vote system or make it work with my site.

item.title: How to edit the vote system Matrix?
item.dc:creator: @fuckyourself fuckyourself
item.description:
@fuckyourself wrote:

On Settings.java under:

public static String[] VOTE_REQUIRED_ITEMS = {

you will see something like this unless you have changed it:

		/* "torva", "virtus", "pernix", "ganodermic", "flaming skull", "polypore", "spirit shield", 
		"chaotic maul", "celestial", "light saber", "monkey cape" */

Simply add /* to the items you donâ€™t want to be a vote required item that is the code i have as you see at the moment none of those items are required to vote since i didnt fixed my vote system yet. If you want only torva out of the voting simply do

		"torva", /* "virtus", "pernix", "ganodermic", "flaming skull", "polypore", "spirit shield", 
		"chaotic maul", "celestial", "light saber", "monkey cape" */

That way all the other items except torva are required to vote

Now to make it work with your site i have no ideia because im trying that too lol

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit the vote system Matrix?
